Penny Barnette You just said you haven't been able to have a garden because of limitations on what you can do with your rental property. So, there's one reason one might not have a garden. Then you say you're going to try raised beds next year. You know that costs some money. Not everyone can afford that, so there's another good reason. Why would you expect other people to do something you haven't been able to do yourself yet? Maybe they have their own good reasons that makes gardening impractical for them. Maybe you should assume people aren't idiots and if they don't have a garden there's a rational reason for it other than just assuming they're lazy?
